title: Borderless Art Comes to Life With Superchief's Network of NFT Galleries
description: The founder of Superchief Gallery is on a mission to connect a global network of 50 physical NFT galleries. First up? IHAM Gallery in Paris.

title: Blockchain.com Secures Payment License from Singapore’s Central Bank
description: In a significant move that underscores Singapore’s commitment to fostering a robust cryptocurrency ecosystem, Blockchain.com, a leading crypto exchange, has secured a payments license from the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS). This development not only solidifies Blockchain.com’s position in the Asian market but also highlights the city-state’s strategic approach to integrating digital currencies into its ... Read more

title: Binance’s stablecoin FDUSD and DigiToads attracting investors
description: Binance's FUSD and DigiToads presale is attracting investors. TOADS has raised over $6.7 million

title: Brazil names its controversial CBDC ‘DREX’
description: Brazil’s Central Bank revealed the official name of the new central bank digital currency (CBDC), also known as the digital real, DREX. The name was revealed during a live broadcast on the bank’s YouTube channel, hosted by Fábio Araújo, coordinator…

title: Mysterious $4.5 Million Ether Burn Incident Stirs Excitement in the Ethereum Community – How Did ETH React to the Unusual Event?
description: On-chain analysts revealed that nd4.eth holds significant tokens from specific protocols.  Ethereum’s trading activity shows consolidation, prompting investors to consider reallocating from Bitcoin.  On July 26, an individual using the ENS name nd4.eth transferred 2,500 ETH valued at $4.5 million to a burn address. This action has garnered considerable attention within the Ethereum community, raising [...]

title: PayPal Introducing its Stablecoin Points to Financial Shift, Sparks Speculation of X Crypto Integration
description: PayPal, the major financial technology firm, has launched a U.S. dollar stablecoin, marking its entry into the digital currency ecosystem. The company’s shares jumped more than 2% following the announcement, igniting speculation about its future plans and indicating a potential strategic shift towards cryptocurrency. In a monumental development as reported by Reuters and Yahoo Finance, [...]
